# Lottery

## How to build

`mvn clean`
`mvn package`
`mvn install dependency:copy-dependencies`

## How to use

For usage:
`java -cp 'target/qortal-lottery-1.0.0.jar:target/dependency/*' org.qortal.at.lottery.Lottery`

Example use:
`java -cp 'target/qortal-lottery-1.0.0.jar:target/dependency/*' org.qortal.at.lottery.Lottery 20160 0.1`
Produces AT creation bytes:
``

These can be passed to `qort-tx` script as part of a `DEPLOY-AT` transaction:

`qort-tx DEPLOY_AT private-key-in-base58 'lottery-test' 'lottery test: payout in 2 weeks, send minimum 0.1 QORT to enter' 'lottery' 'lottery' `
